snippet.title: Nitrous.IO: Community coding with gas
snippet.description: The age of the commodity development VMs has arrived.

snippet.title: Four solutions to managing open source server software
snippet.description: Setting up servers in the cloud is easy, but securely installing and configuring the software isn't. Here are some tools that can help.

snippet.title: Open source's profound impact on the development community
snippet.description: Justin James gives a brief overview of open source's evolution and how perceptions about it have changed. He also explains how open source gives developers new career options.

snippet.title: A developer's predictions for 2013
snippet.description: Justin James reflects on the Java and .NET ecosystems and looks ahead to 2013. Let us know if you agree with his predictions about the development landscape.

snippet.title: 10 skills for developers to focus on in 2013
snippet.description: Development trends that began to emerge in 2012 are picking up steam. Here's a look at the must-know technologies for the year ahead.

snippet.title: December 2012 Geekend movie rundown
snippet.description: The four sci-fi, fantasy, horror, and generally geek-related flicks that will hit U.S. cinemas in December of 2012.

snippet.title: How to set up web filtering solution on Squid Proxy
snippet.description: Guest contributor Rafael Akchurin of QuintoLabs presents this how-to article on setting up web content filtering on Squid Proxy.

snippet.title: 10 skills for developers to focus on in 2012
snippet.description: Quick: Throw out last year's list of must-learn dev skills -- it's already obsolete. This new list will help you rethink your skill set to avoid falling behind.

snippet.title: Three development topics to watch in 2012
snippet.description: HTML5, Windows 8, and mobile development are the only development topics worth talking about this year, according to Justin James.

snippet.title: Programming language choices for an IT manager
snippet.description: Justin James answers a TechRepublic reader's questions about what programming languages to learn and the best way to learn those skills.
